Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy.
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Kalkallo, this modern well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers & investors. With a tastefully designed exterior you will be impressed with the open plan living which includes ducted heating & evaporative cooling, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops, dishwasher & walk in pantry overlooking the meals/living area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, main bathroom, formal lounge/optional study, double lock up garage with internal access plus so much more. All this plus a MASSIVE undercover alfresco entertaining area providing privacy and plenty of space to enjoy all year round. Ideally located in one of Kalkallo's most popular estates, this home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort. You better be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!

Description:
Low Maintenance With Contemporary Charm
Boasting a contemporary layout bathed in natural light, this stunning 4-bedroom family home offers style and comfort in an increasingly desirable new community!
Nestled on a level 350m2 block with easy-care landscaped surrounds, youre perfectly positioned between Donnybrook train station and Hume freeway in walking distance of future shopping and school districts.
Fresh earth tones and high-quality fixtures set the modern tone for this intelligent floor plan, showcasing a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 600mm cooktop, stylish soft-close cabinetry and a centre island laminate benchtop.
The spacious open plan living and dining zones enjoy a stream of sunlight and seamless flow to the low maintenance backyard with storage shed an ideal outdoor retreat with plenty of room for alfresco entertaining.
The master bedroom features a walk-in wardrobe and private ensuite, with built-ins to 2 further bedrooms and the 4th bedroom doubling as a study, extra living area or home office.
A sleek central bathroom and separate laundry each service the main living areas, with internal access provided through the remote control double garage with additional storage space.
Call Mario Pejovski on 0490 815 914 to register your interest in this beautifully presented property today!
Features
- 6-Star Energy Rating
- Ducted Heating & Cooling
- Security Alarm
- NBN Connection
- Solar Hot Water
Upside Contact-Free Policy
In adherence to current restrictions, Upside Realty has implemented procedures for all buyer inspections, as follows:
- Latex gloves and hand sanitisers will be provided for all inspection attendees including the agent
- Social distancing guidelines must be adhered to, including no handshaking
- All contracts issued are paperless
Internal area
206m²

6 Ajax Road Kalkallo - Ready to Move In Brand New Home
(PLEASE USE WWW.WHEREIS.COM OR APPLE IPHONE MAPS TO FIND THE ADDRESS)
Perfect Choice for First Home Buyers & Investors!!
1. Land size - 370 sqm

4. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 6 Ajax Road Kalkallo in the prestigious Cloverton Estate.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home.
6 Ajax Road Features:
- 3 spacious bedrooms, master will full vanity ensuite and walk in robe, remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Games room
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provisions for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Prestige Designer Home
Be welcomed by this impressive classic facade & be graced by the homes impressive interior that flaunts a touch of class, style & captivating spaces.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms (colossal master with large his and hers walk-in robe & double vanity en-suite with stone benches), oversized study which makes for the perfect home office, designer equipped kitchen with 40mm stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, smeg dishwasher, walk-in pantry & crystal glass soft closing kitchen cabinets overlooking a large family & meals area accompanied by an extravagant corner less bifold door alfresco area to entertain family & friends all year round.
Journey on through the home to a separate formal lounge offering plenty of options for the growing family. Adding to this is a sparkling main bathroom, powder room, roomy laundry, oversized double remote garage with internal access, high ceilings & doors, refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, Samsung touch pad door lock, alarm system, double glazed windows, built in robes to all bedrooms, quality 60 x 60 porcelain tiles throughout, double blinds to all bedrooms and perfectly manicured gardens.
Upgrades Include
- Double Glazed Windows
- Refrigerated Cooling
- Colourbond Roof
- 6 Star Ducted Heating
- Corner less Bifold Doors to the Alfresco
Add this home to your inspection list as inspections will not disappoint. Set in a tree lined street and located close to Parks & playgrounds, quality sports facilities, primary & secondary schools, as well as retail/cafe precincts highlight the scope of Cloverton's impressive master plan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.

Description:

Situated in the heart of Cloverton Estate display village is ready to impress the one who inspects with the design and style. Located in a street of high end display homes, you're surrounded by the best. The contemporary façade and landscaped gardens welcome you inside. The open plan living is the heart of the home, the kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops as well as ample bench and cupboard space, with the family meals area adjacent.
Comprising of a well designed master bedroom with ensuite and generous walk-in Robe, the remaining three bedrooms are serviced by BIR and modern family bathroom. Complemented by feature walls in bedrooms, quality fittings, fixtures and finishes. Additionally, the formal living provides a fantastic area to relax with family and friends. Year-round entertaining is made easy with a well done concreted alfresco with a ceiling fan to chill out next to fully landscaped backyard.
- Stylish 4 bedrooms
- Open plan kitchen / meals / family

- Colorbond Roofing
- Heating and cooling

- Stainless steel appliances

- Many more quality fixtures and fittings.

Very close to Donnybrook train station, Convenient and Easy access to Hume freeway, close to proposed Early learning centre, state primary school and private primary school.

Description:
A FAMILY HOME UNLIKE ANY OTHER - DISPLAY HOME NOW SELLING
With its free-flowing design, long-list of features, this single-level display home built by Bentley homes provides the best in comfort and a stress-free family environment that's ready to simply move in and enjoy - all in an established and sought after Cloverton estate with close proximity to the area's future and current attractions.
Flawless from start to finish, this home's impressive interior comprises 4 generous bedrooms (master with WIR & double vanity ensuite), built in robe/walk in robes, central bathroom and a study nook.
Multiple living zones include a the vast open-plan living/dining area overlooking a superb stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry to add this sun-drenched open area you have an additional rumpus room to the rear.
Other features of the home include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, plantation shutters and LED lighting throughout.
The highlights continue outside with an al-fresco entertaining area, plus the added advantage of an oversized double garage with internal entry.
Situated on over 448 square meters of land amongst other quality display homes, this fine residence is only minutes to Donnybrook train station, Hume Grammar primary school, childcare facilities and easy access to Hume Hwy / Fwy.
*Inspection by appointment only*

*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
SOLD BY ARVIN SINGH 0402 713 612 & VIJETH SHETTY 0432 407 840
Set on 635m2 (approx.),this truly is a rare and rewarding opportunity. Embrace fabulous family living in this wonderful Kalkallo home!
Setting the standard for high quality living and entertaining, this sophisticated family home is truly the complete lifestyle package. Situated in a peaceful neighbourhood, next to display home Town Centre's amenities and close picturesque parkland, this stunning family home offers chic modern styling, an abundance of natural light and an indoor/outdoor connection that is hard to beat.
The luxurious master bedroom enjoys a walk-in robe and ensuite with oversized shower, while three additional bedrooms, a sleek family bathroom, theatre room, kids retreat area, bright practical laundry and remarkable size living area with kitchenette perfect for in-law accommodation complete the floor plan. The spacious kitchen which comprises of waterfall stone bench tops and provides modern functionality with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and butler's walk-in pantry connecting to an outstanding dining/living zone overlooking a well-manicured backyard. Journey outside to a magnificent outdoor area surrounded by an exceptional size backyard providing the ultimate lifestyle to entertain family and friends.
Add the convenience of a double remote garage with internal access, plus external lighting and security system for added peace of mind and long list of desired extras... everything you could ever want in your dream family home is right here.
Close to Parks & playgrounds, quality sports facilities, schools, Transport, as well as retail/cafe precincts highlight the scope of Cloverton's impressive master plan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Spacious Family Home
Amazing Opportunity to buy this well presented beautiful home in the heart of Kalkallo on a generous 544sqm block . Picture-perfect from start to finish, uncompromising luxury for the largest of families to live comfortably for years to come is this spectacular 4 bedroom home delivering all that's needed. Fastidiously built to the highest of standards. The grand master bedroom boasts a spacious walk-in-robe and ensuite with double vanities and large shower and 3 other bedrooms with built in robes. Adding to its family appeal is a separate lounge/theatre room. Perfectly balancing practicality and style lovely floorboards highlight it's hallway ,lounge and dining areas whilst the kitchen is dressed in sumptuous stone surfaces with 40mm stone island benchtop with waterfall edges , Ample cupboard space , Walk-in pantry. Euro high end appliances include 900mm Cooktop, Oven, Rangehood, Dishwasher, Inbuilt Microwave. A blend of formal and informal living will cater for the masses or relaxed living in the family meals area and separate Entertaining/Rumpus room.
Walk outside to your stunning undercover alfresco entertaining area ideal for those summer backyard barbeques and gatherings with family and friends along with a surprisingly spacious backyard with plenty of room for the kids to enjoy . Not to forget the provision of gas, electricity , Tv connection for the alfresco with possibility to build an outdoor kitchen and retreat area . The possibilities are endless with the house being Walking distance to parklands & playground, recreational facilities, also offering easy access to the area's future schools, community centre, retail, sports & dining precincts as well as the Hume Freeway & Donnybrook train Station.
Other luxury features include LED downlights, Spacious living area , Security cameras, Alarm ,Floating floorboards in living and dining , Quality carpet in bedrooms ,Remote controlled roller blinds in main living, theatre, and master bedroom , Refrigerated heating and cooling , secure internal access from garage and last but not the least a 6.5 kw Solar panels offering huge savings on electricity bills .
An Opportunity not to be missed. Perfectly placed for families to thrive - Prompt inspection is a must.
For inspection please call Amreen Singh on 0455556041
Other Luxury features Include: -
- Refrigerated heating and cooling with zoning
- Exposed aggregate driveway
- Modern wide Facade
- Spacious Alfresco
- 6.5 KW Solar panel
- Fully landscaped front and back
- Clothesline
- Spacious laundry
- Side access
- Security cameras
- Gas and electricity provision for Alfresco
- Downlights
- Remote Garage
- Remote controlled Roller blinds
- Fly Screens
- Fully tiled showers with niche
- Concrete on all sides
- Double Glazed windows
- Solar panels
- Security doors
- Shed for storage at the back
!!!PHOTO ID REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION!!!

Description:
Stunning Display Home With Luxury In Style !!!
Few words can describe the calibre of this stunning Display home, it is bound to blow you away from the moment you step through the front door. This home offers the ultimate luxury family lifestyle, with the utmost of quality fixtures and fittings throughout .
The grand master suite creates a sense of luxury, with the ensuite featuring a double vanity, tiles fully reached to the ceilings, generous walk-in robe and shower with a separate toilet.The remaining three bedrooms provide ample accommodation with a central second living space for entertainment as well as the central bathroom designed with an ample sky light and separate toilet.
This single level luxury home, offers an open plan kitchen, living and dining area which has access to decked outdoor entertainment area and fully landscaped backyard . Kitchen offers stone benchtops, separate walk-in pantry, quality stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher. With an abundance of space and storage throughout, this home is perfect for the growing family and those who love to entertain, by infusing the perfect blend of luxury and modern styling.
Expertly styled by industry leading interior designers
- Stylish 4 bedrooms
- Multiple living spaces
- Open plan kitchen / meals / family
- Double garage with remote control
- Security system
- Heating and cooling
- Alfresco
- Upgraded electrical fit-out and lighting
- Quality window furnishings
- LED Downlights
- Floor coverings throughout
- Fully landscaped gardens
- Fully Fenced
- Stone benchtops
- Stainless steel appliances
- Many more quality fixtures and fittings.
Images For Illustrative Purposes Only
Very close to Donnybrook train station, Convenient and Easy access to Hume freeway, close to proposed Early learning centre, state primary school, private primary school, community centre and convenience retail.

Description:
Brand New & Move In Ready!
Please contact us to arrange a private inspection
When you walk through this home, it is sure to be love at first sight, with luxury living in mind and one of the area's finest homes, boasting five bedrooms, multiple living rooms and remarkable attention to detail, designed and built by Burbank Homes with no expence spared.
Own a piece of real estate that will surely delight your senses with its luxury set across two spacious storeys.
On the ground floor, a large hallway welcomes you into your open plan kitchen with walk in pantry and stone bench tops, a large island bench, 900mm Westinghouse oven-stove top and a Dishlex dishwasher all adjoining to a large dining and tiled family area that continues to a beautiful merbau decked alfresco and large landscaped backyard.
Upstairs, the master bedroom enjoys his and her's walk in robe and large ensuite, with additional 4 rooms and second living room, all with gas zoned ducted heating and split system refrigerated air conditioning on both levels.
Additional features include: fully landscaped, gas ducted heating, solar and continuous gas hot water system, a large study nook, window furnishings, fly screens, security alarm, NBN ready, remote lock up garage, clothes line, private access to the home and the backyard - this home simply has it all.
I look forward to introducing you to this wonderful family residence located in one of the largest master planned communities in Victoria. See you at the next open home.
